body.name: 44011530 Chandler Premium 4-in-1 Convertible Crib, Curved Headboard, Wire Brush Graphite Gray Finish, GreenGuard Gold Certified
body.stockDetail: Only 2 left in stock (more on the way).
features: SAFETY FIRST: Soho Baby Nursery Furniture is made to the highest safety standards set by the CPSC and ASTM; Our furniture endures rigorous testing by 3rd party labs to guarantee compliance with U.S. and C.A. safety standards

SOPHISTICATED STYLING: The Chandler Crib boasts an intricate full panel gently curved headboard with beautifully refined vertical shiplap detail complemented by horizontal clean line accents, and a grainy wire brush finish

PREMIUM QUALITY & CRAFTSMANSHIP: Made from solid woods and wood veneers and backed by a 1 Year Limited Manufacturer’s Warranty, this crib is expertly crafted from solid and sustainably sourced wood providing quality construction creating a safer, sturdier sleep environment for your baby

THOUGHTFULLY DESIGNED: Designed to fit a standard-sized crib mattress, this Soho Baby 4-in-1 Crib offers a convenient convertible design that will grow as your child grows by converting from a crib to toddler bed, daybed, and full-size bed with 3-levels of mattress height adjustments for your growing child

GREENGUARD GOLD CERTIFIED: The Soho Baby Chandler 4-in-1 Convertible Crib has achieved GREENGUARD GOLD Certification; GREENGUARD GOLD Certified products have undergone rigorous testing for over 10,000 chemical emissions, ensuring that this product is certified for low chemical emissions into indoor air during product usage
body.description: The sophisticated Soho Baby Chandler 4-in-1 Convertible Crib adds luxury and style to your nursery with a design that grows with your child. Made from solid woods and wood veneers, this crib is expertly crafted from solid and sustainably sourced wood providing quality construction creating a safer, sturdier sleep environment for your baby. The Chandler Crib boasts an intricate full panel gently curved headboard with beautifully refined vertical shiplap detail complemented by horizontal clean line accents, and a grainy wire brush finish. Thoughtfully designed to fit a standard-sized crib mattress, this Soho Baby 4-in-1 Crib offers a convenient convertible design that will grow as your child grows by converting from a crib to toddler bed, daybed, and full-size bed with 3-levels of mattress height adjustments for your growing child. The Chandler Collection by Soho Baby in Graphite Gray features a 4-in-1 Convertible Crib (44011530), 2-Drawer Nightstand (44022530), 5-Drawer Dresser (44035530), 6-Drawer Dresser (44036530), Changing Topper (44065530), Toddler Bed Guard Rail (44095530), Full-Size Bed Conversion Kit (44088530), and Soho Baby Crib Mattress, sold separately. The Chandler Collection is available in Graphite Gray and Stone Wash finishes which complement many design and décor aesthetics. This full-size Soho Baby Crib arrives ready to assemble and includes hardware for assembly. The crib measures 32.25 in. W x 58.88 in. D x 47.50 in. H (79.40 lbs.) and can accommodate up to 50 pounds when used as a crib, toddler bed, or day bed and 400 pounds when converted to a full-size bed. Plus, this crib is backed by a 1 Year Limited Manufacturer’s Warranty. The Soho Baby Chandler 4-in-1 Convertible Crib has achieved GREENGUARD GOLD Certification. GREENGUARD GOLD Certified products are certified to GREENGUARD GOLD standards for low chemical emissions into indoor air during product usage.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Greenguard Gold Certified Tested for over 10,000 chemicals and VOC's, ensuring that your little one is sleeping in a safe and healthy environment. 3 Adjustable Height Settings Thoughtfully designed to lower as your baby crawls, sits, and stands. The mattress support will lower to accommodate your child's growing needs. Superior Construction Soho Baby cribs are made from the finest materials for durability, and sourced from sustainable forests.

Chandler Crib The Chandler 4-in-1 Convertible Crib grows with your child over time for long-lasting value. Chandler Toddler Bed The Chandler 4-in-1 Convertible Crib adapts into a grand toddler bed; this stage teaches your child to get in and out of bed on their own. Toddler Guard Rail sold separately. Chandler Day Bed For added versatility, the Chandler 4-in-1 Convertible Crib converts into a day bed. Chandler Full Size Bed The Chandler 4-in-1 Convertible Crib converts into a spacious full size bed for your little one. Full Bed Conversion Kit sold separately.
